node.excerpt: Design systems play a crucial role in ensuring consistency and efficiency in product development. They provide a centralized repository of components, guidelines, and best practices that can be reused across projects. However, creating and maintaining a design system is not a one-person job and requires collaboration from multiple teams, including product development teams.
